title: New patch problem Click to Accept to play game but its show that yu have declined the game
body: I do not know what going on with this new patch but when I start queue than its show to accept button but when i click on accept button before its going towards champion selection process, that time my game message board showing me you has been declined game play but i accepted it :( after several tries same problem facing again and again,  its start showing me right now if you do that again penlty will be charge on me. what can i do?? why this going on?? is it only me or some one else also facing this. Please help me

replies.body: Thats been around since late season 4 its just rare.

I have had this problem, but just once. 
I didn't get the repeated warning.

I just clicked accept, and then the timer ran out and i was put back into the lobby.
